original_title: Uomini sull'orlo di una crisi di nervi
overview: "Men on the edge of a nervous breakdown" - Vincenzo, Gianni, Nicola and Pino are four friends who for years have been seeing every Monday to play poker. But this time Nicola is in crisis with his wife. The evening is ruined, but Pino has an idea. Why not invite a "ring"?
title: Uomini sull'orlo di una crisi di nervi
